front.title: Signalling DHCPv6 Prefix per Client Availability to Hosts

abstract.t: This document defines a "P" flag in the Prefix Information Option (PIO) of IPv6 Router Advertisements (RAs). The flag is used to indicate that the network prefers that clients use the [I-D.ietf-v6ops-dhcp-pd-per-device] deployment model instead of using individual adresses in the on-link prefix assigned using SLAAC or DHCPv6 IA_NA.
